document.heading: Pipefitting, Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Mechanic Occupations Equality Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-274, the “Pipefitting, Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Mechanic Occupations Equality Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-632. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012 and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 23, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-638 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-274 became effective on April 23, 2013.
